EmailTemplate.subject: RE: net cash (1330021151.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Michael, Hope you are doing well. Just wanted to check in with you; did you decide on sticking with Crescent’s W-2 or are you still considering using MBO? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Sara Conde Sent: Friday, February 17, 2012 3:52 PM To: 'Michael Littleton' Subject: RE: net cash Hi Michael, There is no monthly fee with MBO. Our service is 5% of the top of each invoice taken off pre-tax like a business expense. When you get paid MBO get’s paid, that’s the only way we make money. The fee does drop to 1.5% when we receive $125k in payments and then resets to 5% each anniversary year. Please let me know if you have additional questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd1hNoUtz%2F%2FOXMaTsljngY5mgtLMzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Michael Littleton [mailto:littletonsmail@yahoo.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Friday, February 17, 2012 3:37 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: net cash Question.. services are $640 a month??
